name: deimosrising
text: My babies will all wear Wu Tang gear. I'm going to name them Tony Starks, Johnny Blaze, and the GZA.

name: dwilow
text: Instead of GZA it should be Maximillion, if only to keep up with the Cuban Linx theme.  I'm partial to Dirt McGirt, myself.

name: c_dizzle
text: Funny, how this sounds related to what they're doing to the new chipmunks movie. Anyone? Anyone?

name: farqussus
text: <tum-ble-weeeeeeeds>

name: relaxing
text: My firstborn will be Prince Rakeem, followed by Pretty Toney and the Dutch Masta Killa.

name: njury
text:
Does this mean you're dutch yourself?
I am asking because I am one myself.

Although those would be weird names for a dutch kid.

name: relaxing
text:
Sorry dude, it's just a line from one of their songs.

Anyhow... I'm raw! I'm rugged and raw! I repeat! If I die, my seed will be ill like me!

name: gitarooman
text: For the uninformed, a Dutch Master is a particular type of cheap cigar that is often used in rolling marijuana blunts.

name: genequagmire
text: I was the thrilla in the Ali-Frazier in Manilla.

name: johnnyrocker
text:
I love how the Wu Tang are really just huge dorks.
Kung Fu movies, Iron Man, Ghost Rider... The Wu Tang Clan are really just the dudes I used to hang out with in High School.

name: senseihollywood
text: I have a whole bag of spinner yo-yo's from my Mom's store...

name: whuppins
text: I don't know if it was intentional or not, but ODB is the only correct choice for the detachable member. Even when he was alive, he always had the highest chance of being MIA for any given gathering.

name: stuart
text: "For when ODB is in prison or on the lam"

name: benhead
text:
hehe..."detachable member".

(Sorry, I couldn't resist making a combined Beavis & Butt-Head and King Missile reference.)

name: soticoto
text: I thought you said "MIA for any given f athering".

name: sargasm
text: I can picture Ray's description of their catalogue going on for hours and hours.  Poor Waterbury.

name: connellingus
text: Did Chris manage to predict ODB's death by two months ?

name: tttt
text: I saw no prediction of death in this strip so I guess not

name: connellingus
text: I didn't see the alt-text when I posted that, but I thought ODB's impending death would be a pretty good reason to make him detachable.

name: stuart
text: I guess Onstad sort of has a crier of death thing going huh?

name: lolsworth
text: Charles Bronson, James Brown...pray he never mentions you by name in the strip. Unless you're already really fucking old, like Beverly Cleary

name: crinklebat
text: I can't even estimate how much I would pay for that mobile. Hell, I'd have a kid just so I could put the mobile in its room.

name: ortsac
text: You would make a very bad parent.

name: changuitotuerto
text: I was willing to pay a lot more when I thought it was a car

name: ccp
text: A comment left by ccp was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by johnnybaverage, Contrasoma, mball, seanbateman, Overmedicated, Mangtastic, hectik, Plurabelle, rowboat, Gigs, Ebessan, theplaidknight, Mastronaut)

name: hypoluxa
text: R.I.P., Big Baby Jesus

name: boredom_man
text: I'm going to go listen to Boy George while pouring one out for Big Baby Jesus right now

name: rowboat
text: Does Ray eat chicken using only a knife?

name: turnabout
text: Only the drumsticks.

name: chewy
text: The anniversary of his death was only a couple of days before I re-read this arc. Spooky.

name: lost_buoy
text: Babies love ODB's shiny grill!

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

Ray: Tonight's party, kind of a new thing

name: akadriver
text:
Forty-five degrees is the proper angle of lean for a rear-facing car seat. I am not joking.

Forty-five degrees.

name: jaldor
text: So guys, I've been thinking of fucking with the Wu-Tang clan. Seems like a reasonable idea to me.

name: biznart
text: As long as you diversify your bonds (and shit), you should be alright.
